mdRecord.dcterms:title: Co-expression of Nhlh2 mRNA and Snhg14 long noncoding RNA in the paraventricular nucleus (PVN) of the hypothalamus
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The paraventricular nucleus (PVN) of the hypothalamus. PVN is a key area in the control of appetite and contains neurons with the melanocortin-4 receptor (food and body weight regulation), and tyrotropin-releasing hormone (TRH) neurons (regulation of energy homeostasis)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Shadi Ariyanfar
